onboardingDescriptionone: All HR services are available to you in one place to simplify managing your requests and daily tasks.
onboardingDescriptiontwo: Check your leave balance, travel requests, update data, and more easily and quickly.
onboardingDescriptionthree: A simple and clear design helps you access your services without complexity or delay.

request_general_help:
This page allows you to submit a general administrative request easily.

✅ From this page, you can:
• Create a new request
• Add a reason and personal notes
• Change the request date
• Edit a previous request if its status allows
• Save and submit the request to the responsible department

✅ Field Description:
• Request Number: Automatically shown for edited requests
• Request Date: Can be changed using the date picker
• Notes: Optional additional information
• Reason: A brief explanation of the request (required)

✅ After submission:
• A confirmation message will appear
• You will be redirected to the request history page to follow the status
• You may edit the request later depending on its status.
transfer_request_help:
This page allows you to submit an employee transfer request easily.

✅ On this page, you can:
• Submit a new transfer request
• Edit an existing transfer request if its status allows
• Select the employee to be transferred
• Choose the new department, branch, and project for the employee
• Enter the reason for the transfer
• Save and submit the request to the concerned department

✅ Field explanations:
• Request Number: Automatically generated and cannot be changed for new requests
• Request Date: Choose the date of the request submission
• Employee: Select the employee
solfa_request_help:
This page allows you to submit an employee loan request easily.

✅ On this page, you can:
• Submit a new loan request
• Edit an existing loan request if its status allows
• Select the employee to receive the loan
• Choose the loan type, amount, and number of installments
• Add guarantor employees
• Enter additional notes
• Save and submit the request to the concerned department

✅ Field explanations:
• Request Number: Automatically generated for new requests
• Request Date: Select the date of the request submission
• Loan Type: Choose from the list of available loan types
• Loan Amount: Enter the requested amount
• Installments: Number of installments for repayment
• Installment Amount: Automatically calculated based on amount and installments
• Discount Date: Select the start date for deduction
• Employee: Select the employee receiving the loan
• Guarantor 1 & 2: Select the guarantor employees
• Notes: Optional additional information

✅ After submission:
• A notification will appear confirming successful submission
• You will be redirected to the loan request history page to track the status
• You can edit the request later depending on its status.
sesid_change_help:
This page allows you to request a change of your device ID (SESID).

✅ On this page, you can:
• See your employee code automatically
• See the request date automatically
• See the new SESID of your current device
• Enter the reason for requesting the SESID change

✅ After submission:
• The request will be submitted to management for review and approval
• You will be notified about the status of your request later
resignation_help:
This page allows you to submit a resignation request.

✅ On this page, you can:
• See the request number automatically if editing an existing request
• Choose the request date
• Specify the last working day
• Enter optional notes

✅ After submission:
• The request will be submitted to management for review and approval
• You will be notified of the request status later
• You can edit the request later depending on its status
ticket_request_help:
This page allows you to submit a ticket request.

✅ On this page, you can:
• See the request number automatically if editing an existing request
• Choose the request date
• Specify the travel date and number of tickets
• Enter the travel destination and reason
• Select travel type (one-way / round trip)

✅ After submission:
• The request will be sent to management for review and approval
• You will be notified of the request status later
• You can edit the request later depending on its status
request_leave_screen:
This page allows you to submit or edit leave requests.

✅ On this page you can:
• Automatically display the request number if it is an edited request
• Select the request date
• Choose the request owner and the alternative employee
• Select the type of leave
• Specify the start and end dates of the leave and automatically calculate the number of days
• Enter additional notes
• Select the services required for the request
• Upload attachments and view or delete them

✅ After submission:
• The request will be sent to management for review and approval
• Leave balances and alternative balances will be updated automatically
• You will receive a notification about the request status later
• You can edit the request later according to its status
request_a_car_screen:
This page allows you to submit or edit a car request.

✅ On this page you can:
• Automatically display the request number if it is an edited request
• Select the request date
• Choose the type of car
• Enter the purpose of the trip
• Add additional notes

✅ After submission:
• The request will be sent to management for review and approval
• You will receive a notification about the request status later
• You can edit the request later according to its status
housing_allowance_request_screen:
This page allows you to submit or edit a housing allowance request.

✅ On this page you can:
• View the request number automatically if it is an edited request
• Select the request date
• Specify the housing place or allowance type
• Enter the requested amount
• Add additional notes

✅ After submission:
• The request will be sent to management for review and approval
• You will receive a notification about the request status later
• You can edit the request later depending on its status
back_from_vacation_screen:
This page allows you to submit or edit a vacation return request.

✅ On this page you can:
• View the request number automatically if it is an edited request
• Select the request date
• Specify the vacation start and end dates
• Specify the actual return date
• See the number of vacation days and any late days
• Add additional notes

✅ After submission:
• The request will be sent to management for review and approval
• You will receive a notification about the request status later
• You can edit the request later depending on its status
